data.eml:eml: Review of the Megauchenia Macleay of India (Coleoptera: Nitidulidae: Prometopinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dasgupta, J., Pal, T. K., Hegde, V. D. (2015): Review of the Megauchenia Macleay of India (Coleoptera: Nitidulidae: Prometopinae). Zootaxa 4058 (4): 551-560, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4058.4.6
